name: Pizza Carman
description:
LOOK OUT! This ambitious delivery boy is one-of-a-kind and ready for his new job at the local pizza store. 

A pizza delivery employee must be a safe driver, fast, and versatile in order to deliver the pizza on time. But sometimes, you are stuck with your car on the highway. And other times, walking on foot can be a drag. What to do, what to do...

A demonstration project for the Global Game Jam of 2022 made by a team of students from Concordia University, ready to be participating in a university competition. This project was an experiment and learning experience for the team. This year's theme was Duality.

*CONTROLS*

WASD or Gamepad Left Stick for movement

CTRL to switch between car/human states

SPACE to reorient the car when flipped over

*CREDITS*

Programmers:

  • George Mavroeidis
  • Anas Peerzada

Artists:

  • Jacob Garneau
  • Sharon Ku

*ASSETS*

Art assets are self-made. Sounds are from freesound.org

Music:

  • Trap Adventure 2 - Main Theme
  • 8-bit Uplifting Royalty-Free Music
